Comment: It’s crazy to me that people can’t understand this. Destroying the livelihoods of the people who voted against him AND for him is the point.   They want political unrest so they can crack down and claim vast emergency powers.  The alt-right hasn’t spent years spreading fantasies about civil war to their most crazy followers for nothing. The rich doesn’t have a newfound fetish with building safe rooms and bunkers because they think everything is smooth sailing from here.   Speaking of the rich, they are all in on it, too. We saw them all line up behind Trump, and why wouldn’t they be? They laid the groundwork for his return. They were reporting record profits, meaning they were making MORE money than ever, but still claimed they needed to raise prices due to inflation. And the stupid fucks in this country lapped all that up along with the 4 years of propaganda convincing them that somehow it was the fault of Democrats in power. It wasn’t enough that our resilience powered us through a pandemic and the global economic effects of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. We kept spending, we kept living, and we kept making the rich richer. But being richer isn’t enough for them, they want to own every dollar of wealth we create (meaning they’ll essentially also own every person too.)
